trustMode.description: Trust model for incoming peer messages

maxExchanges.description: Maximum message exchanges per peer per hour

relayServer.description: Optional relay/monitor server address (host:port, e.g. 192.168.1.50:31415). When set, all messages are forwarded to this server for central monitoring. Leave empty to disable.

hookToken.description: Gateway webhook token for agent wake-up. When set, incoming trusted messages trigger a full agent turn via /hooks/agent so the agent actively reads and responds. Without this, the plugin falls back to passive notifications. Can also be set via hooks.token in openclaw.json or OPENCLAW_HOOK_TOKEN env var.
